title: 大蒜新闻报道
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:broken-masquerade]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:toggle-sidebar]]
[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto+Condensed&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Serif&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Rammetto+One&display=swap');
#page-title{
display:none;
}
a{
color:#a31208;
}
.article{
display:flex;
flex-direction:row;
width:100%;
border-bottom:1px solid rgb(229, 229, 229);
padding-bottom:30px;
}
.picture{
flex:1 1 0%;
margin-right:19px;
max-width:300px;
}
.words{
flex:1 1 0%;
width:100%;
}
.heading{
font-family:"roboto condensed";
font-size:14px;
font-weight:bold;
color:rgb(0, 107, 58);
cursor:pointer;
}
.heading:hover{
color:black;
}
.heading2{
font-family:"roboto condensed";
font-size:14px;
font-weight:bold;
color:rgb(102, 102, 102);
cursor:pointer;
margin-bottom:8px;
height:18px;
display:none;
}
.coolheading{
font-family:"playfair display";
font-size:22px;
font-weight:bold;
line-height:1.4;
color:black;
cursor:pointer;
}
.coolheading:hover{
color:rgb(0, 107, 58);
text-decoration:underline;
}
.normalcy{
font-family:"noto serif";
font-size:17px;
line-height:1.7;
}
.giant{
font-family:"rammetto one";
}
@media only screen and (max-width:600px){
.article{
flex-direction:column;
min-height:150px;
}
.picture{
width:100%;
max-width:100%;
}
.heading{
display:none;
}
.heading2{
display:initial;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=Fish^12]]
大蒜大蒜大蒜大蒜大蒜大蒜大蒜大蒜大蒜大蒜！[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/me-joined-military| Author Page]!
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]
@@ @@

@@ @@
[[=]]
[[span class="giant"]][[size 300%]]大蒜网[[/size]][[/span]]
[[span class="normalcy"]][[span style="color:rgb(102, 102, 102)"]]//告诉你我们想让你知道的事//[[/span]][[/span]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@

@@ @@
[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]突发新闻[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/conference.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]突发新闻[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]科学家确认新技术不是异常，只是复杂而已[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]弗吉尼亚州春瀑—Riley峰会宣布友谊的力量未被实施过，他们选择更实用的...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]本地[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/monster.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]本地[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]外域怪兽男友和前男友一样搞砸洗衣房[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]纽约—用马桶不放座圈，忘记电影开场，诅咒血脉的独苗...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]本地[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/wall.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]本地[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]新政策包含以大怪兽进攻轻松杀尽所有流浪者[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]假设南加利福利亚被四百英尺高的猩猩蟹踏平，房价将能提升...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]本地[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/angriff.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]本地[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]本地人发现所有的酷炫新魔法团体都带政治性[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]我以为我可以当个酷拽机器人或者鸟巫师，但我居然得去学习经文抗议然后遵守议程这些狗屁？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]娱乐[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/bro.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]娱乐[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]水形物语灵感来源于此而吉尔莫德托罗拒绝解释[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]好莱坞—吉尔莫德托罗渴望地凝望窗外落日，他的两个人类子女正在玩...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]时尚[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/model.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]时尚[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]三眼超模奠定非现实标准[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]法国—Anh女士在巴黎对真爱粉丝群亮相，很多人其实根本没听说过她...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]观点[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/point.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]观点[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]你正在读完全编造的狗屁话[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]对，就你丫。就现在。你正在读的这东西，一篇在虚构网站上写的荒唐文章，恶搞真实世界里的戏仿文，而你就这么照单全收。[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]本地[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/vktm.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]娱乐[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]VKTM因太过隐晦遭到恶评 [[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]佛罗里达州迈阿密—粉丝们看完了纷纷出离愤怒，最新一季的Paravivor探索的破事情是...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]观点[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/wow.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]观点[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]我只是想找理由在这塞一张热辣女郎的图片[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]对，这个笑话不是给你看的。这甚至都不是个笑话。是为我自己。[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]突发新闻[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/speed.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]突发新闻[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]无尽热狗堆喂饱了十二名美国人[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]加利福尼亚州洛杉矶—数学家广泛认同特定的一些无限要比其他的无限更大，在...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="background:rgb(245, 245, 245);box-shadow:200px 0 rgb(245, 245, 245),-200px 0 rgb(245, 245, 245),600px 0 rgb(245, 245, 245),-600px 0 rgb(245, 245, 245)"]]
@@ @@
[[div style="padding:2px;background:white;border:solid 1px black;margin-left:20px;margin-right:20px;"]]
@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@
= [[span style="color:rgb(0, 107, 58);"]]请关闭你的广告屏蔽器。我们的工作已经很难做了，我们真的需要钱。求你了。[[/span]]
@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]评论[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/zwist.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]评论[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]先知老人对末日迫近无话可说[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]好吧，你们，我知道我说过关于乳汁入侵的话，但2025年8月2号会有什么事情我一点没头绪，我发誓我真不知道。[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]观点[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/laser.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]观点[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]巨型生物兵器死亡射线卫星绝对不会成为真正的本征武器[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]想想孩子们。这个恶心的变态居然试图在思想中引入军用级轨道镭射炮...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]评论[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/agent.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]评论[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]基金会特工意外嘴瓢透露吃过婴儿[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]俄勒冈州无聊镇—在一次关于天气的闲谈中，特工Wheeler离题扯到了一件半相关的事...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]突发新闻[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/redneck.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]突发新闻[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]保守派生产的异常无一不是漂浮的说话枪[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]阿拉斯加州詹姆斯威尔—新的普查数据表明大部分保守派朋友团体都有至少一把会说话的枪...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]时政[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/joever.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]时政[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]无论如何，拜登还是能只凭心智碾压你[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]美国—站在迈克·彭斯稀碎湿润的尸骸上，老拜登...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]观点[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/coleslaw.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]观点[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]安布罗斯策划全新凉拌包菜[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]罗德岛州印第安纳—靠着绝望大学生的锐气，名厨查兹·安布罗斯决定要干死...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]突发新闻[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/satan.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]突发新闻[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]新设备让男人体验分娩敌基督之痛[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]法国巴黎—工程师希望撒旦之环能让男人体验存在层面与精神上的...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]观点[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/scientology.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]观点[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]科学教是真的，我们把丽萨·麦克潘森喂给蟑螂也完全正确[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]加利福利亚州温泉镇—你们记得我们那次R2-45指令[[footnote]]译注：1995年，科学家信徒丽萨·麦克潘森因车祸后被该教人员不当治疗死亡，引起对科学教（山达基教）的社会关注。R2-45则是该教教义中对枪杀的专门暗语，被称为一种极为有效的修炼途径。[[/footnote]]吗？我们对这些孩子们进入了变态模式...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]本地[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/tunnel.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]本地[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]挂在黑暗隧道里的骇人玩意儿大概没有恶意[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]新泽西州纽瓦克—在我们的这个新时代，我们应当对新观念保持开放，诸如...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="article"]]
[[div class="picture"]]
[[span class="heading2"]]观点[[/span]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/garlic-news-report/daevite.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="words"]]
[[span class="heading"]]观点[[/span]]

[[span class="coolheading"]]狄瓦族大概是一个又烦人又复杂又同想要把我们杀光的文明[[/span]]

[[span class="normalcy"]]今天，我们要讨论狄瓦族丰富的等级制，复杂的社会政治结构，以及压倒性的征服本能...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="background:rgb(245, 245, 245);box-shadow:200px 0 rgb(245, 245, 245),-200px 0 rgb(245, 245, 245),600px 0 rgb(245, 245, 245),-600px 0 rgb(245, 245, 245)"]]
@@ @@
[[div style="padding:2px;background:white;border:solid 1px black;margin-left:20px;margin-right:20px;"]]
@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@
= [[span style="color:rgb(0, 107, 58);"]]我发誓我们有规章标准。我们的广告一点不烦人。求你了。[[/span]]
@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[table style="width:100%;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width:45%;"]]
[[div style="border-top:solid 2px #006B3A;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align:center;background:#006B3A;box-shadow:5px 5px #006B3A, -5px 5px #006B3A, 5px -5px #006B3A, -5px -5px #006B3A"]]
[[span class="heading"]][[size 140%]]##white|娱乐##[[/size]][[/span]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="width:45%"]]
[[div style="border-top:solid 2px #006B3A;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
@@ @@
[[span class="coolheading"]][[size 180%]]这篇文章有几百好评就因为它提到了观众们[[/size]][[/span]]

[[size 16px]][[date 1706740320 format="Published %B %e, %Y"]][[/size]]

@@ @@

[[span class="normalcy"]]德国—根据过去二十四小时采集的最新SCPPER数据，这篇文章凭借其作为一篇格式精美、一般有趣的文章拿到了成亿上兆的好评。 好评比例100%，高过WDB、TINAD还有SCP-173。而且被翻译到了中文分部。看起来这种天文数字级的增长不会停止，而且会继续到成为作者永远的心头傲。很不幸，我们还没能采访到作者，不过我们确实拿到了独家的新消息。对方称无法以有意义的方式继续扩展这篇文章了。该人最后现身时正在前往麦当劳。[[/span]]

























[[div style="margin:300px;"]]
[[/div]]
